languages.text: "Ваши слова... окружают грязные цвета, Абеляр. Не позволяйте чужому яду отравить свою душу — на вас это совсем не похоже".
"Grimy colours swirl around your words, Abelard. Do not let another's poison pollute your soul — this is not like you at all."
languages.original_text: "Ваши слова... окружают грязные цвета, Абеляр. Не позволяйте чужому яду отравить свою душу — на вас это совсем не похоже".

traits.locale_text: "Grimy colours swirl around your words, Abelard. Do not let another's poison pollute your soul — this is not like you at all."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Grimy colours swirl around your words, Abelard. Do not let another's poison pollute your soul — this is not like you at all."

languages.text: “阿贝拉德，你的话语中混杂着阴沉的色彩。不要任由别人的剧毒玷污你的灵魂……这一点都不像你。”
languages.original_text: "Grimy colours swirl around your words, Abelard. Do not let another's poison pollute your soul — this is not like you at all."

traits.locale_text: “阿贝拉德，你的话语中混杂着阴沉的色彩。不要任由别人的剧毒玷污你的灵魂……这一点都不像你。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Vos paroles sont enveloppées de couleurs bien sordides, Abélard. Ne laissez pas le venin d'un autre empoisonner votre âme. Ça ne vous ressemble pas. »
languages.original_text: "Grimy colours swirl around your words, Abelard. Do not let another's poison pollute your soul — this is not like you at all."

traits.locale_text: « Vos paroles sont enveloppées de couleurs bien sordides, Abélard. Ne laissez pas le venin d'un autre empoisonner votre âme. Ça ne vous ressemble pas. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Colores mugrientos rodean sus palabras, Abelard. No deje que el veneno ajeno contamine su alma, esto no es propio de usted».
languages.original_text: "Grimy colours swirl around your words, Abelard. Do not let another's poison pollute your soul — this is not like you at all."

traits.locale_text: «Colores mugrientos rodean sus palabras, Abelard. No deje que el veneno ajeno contamine su alma, esto no es propio de usted».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「アベラルド、あなたの言葉にはすすけた色が渦巻いています。他人の毒で魂を汚してはなりません…あなたとは似ても似つきません」
languages.original_text: "Grimy colours swirl around your words, Abelard. Do not let another's poison pollute your soul — this is not like you at all."

traits.locale_text: 「アベラルド、あなたの言葉にはすすけた色が渦巻いています。他人の毒で魂を汚してはなりません…あなたとは似ても似つきません」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Schmutzige Farben wirbeln um Eure Worte, Abelard. Lasst Eure Seele nicht vom Gift eines anderen verunreinigen — das sieht Euch gar nicht ähnlich."
languages.original_text: "Grimy colours swirl around your words, Abelard. Do not let another's poison pollute your soul — this is not like you at all."

traits.locale_text: "Schmutzige Farben wirbeln um Eure Worte, Abelard. Lasst Eure Seele nicht vom Gift eines anderen verunreinigen — das sieht Euch gar nicht ähnlich."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Grimy colours swirl around your words, Abelard. Do not let another's poison pollute your soul — this is not like you at all."

languages.text: "İtici bir renk, kelimelerini sarıyor Abelard. Başkalarının zehri, ruhunu kirletmesin. Sen böyle birisi değilsin."
languages.original_text: "Grimy colours swirl around your words, Abelard. Do not let another's poison pollute your soul — this is not like you at all."

traits.locale_text: "Kelimelerini kaplayan itici bir renk var Abelard. Başkalarının zehrinin ruhunu kirletmesine izin verme. Hiç sana göre değil."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
